mapper.select: SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.USE_YYMM , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.SALE_ITM_CD , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.SO_ID , MAX(A.GRP_ID) AS GRP_ID , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , CASE WHEN C.CUST_ID IS NULL THEN '1111111111' ELSE C.CUST_ID END AS CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , MAX(A.PROD_CD) AS PROD_CD , A.SVC_CD , A.BIZ_CL , A.PROD_GRP , A.SVC_GRP , A.SALE_TP , 0 AS ADJ_AMT , SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS SALE_AMT , 0 AS VAT , 0 AS SCT , MIN(A.PAY_DUE_DT) AS PAY_DUE_DT , CASE WHEN MAX(C.TAX_TP) IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE MAX(C.TAX_TP) END AS TAX_TP , MAX(AA.ORG_ID) AS ATRT_COPR_ID , MAX(AA.USR_ID) AS ATRT_EMP_ID , SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS WON_SALE_AMT , A.CRNCY_CD , A.EXRATE , MAX(A.EXRATE_APLY_DT) AS EXRATE_APLY_DT , A.SALE_TP FROM TBLIV_BILL A LEFT OUTER JOIN IFNBRM_CTRT_INFO AA ON A.CTRT_ID = AA.CTRT_ID AND A.SO_ID = AA.SO_ID , IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_INFO B , IFNBRM_CUST_INFO C WHERE A.BILL_YYMM >= #{useYymm} AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.CHRG_ITM_CD = B.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD AND A.SO_ID = C.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = C.PYM_ACNT_ID AND A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND A.BILL_CYCL = '01' AND A.BILL_AMT != 0 GROUP BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO , A.USE_YYMM , A.PROD_CMPS_ID , A.SVC_CMPS_ID , A.SALE_ITM_CD , A.BILL_MM_TP , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.BILL_DT , A.SO_ID , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , CASE WHEN C.CUST_ID IS NULL THEN '1111111111' ELSE C.CUST_ID END , A.CTRT_ID , A.SVC_CD , A.BIZ_CL , A.PROD_GRP , A.SVC_GRP , A.SALE_TP , A.CRNCY_CD , A.EXRATE , A.SALE_TP
